activities.loc: Richland County Courtroom, Floor C, Courthouse

result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Contong NMI Vongphakdy

records.addlTxt:
2:45 PM 2022CF000070, 2022CF000085, 2022CF000045 - Defendant Contong NMI Vongphakdy in court, in custody.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Contong NMI Vongphakdy.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Attorney Bartelt is prepared to enter a plea in 22CF70 and 22CF85 along with requesting another status. Court states the max penalties. Attorney Bartelt stands mute. Defendant will be appearing by zoom. Attorney Bartelt will make the arraignments.
Status conference scheduled for November 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Status conference on November 30, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

11:13 AM Prelim in 22CF70 and 22CF85, waivers on file, and status in 22CF45. Defendant Contong NMI Vongphakdy appeared by video from the Richland County Jail.  Attorney Peter A. Bartelt in court for Contong NMI Vongphakdy.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. Prelim waivers have been filed in 22CF70 and 22CF85. At 11:19 a.m., Def joins the hearing in person due to audio issues with the jail connection. Court conducts prelim waiver colloquy with Def. Prelim waivers accepted. Bindover ordered. Arraignment set 9/28 at 2.
Status conference scheduled for September 28, 2022 at 02:00 pm.
Status conference on September 28, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

1:28 PM Defendant Contong NMI Vongphakdy in court.  Attorney Jennifer M. Harper in court for State of Wisconsin. CV has received the criminal complaint. Court states the max penalties. Attorney Harper states that the defendant is currently on bond and has advised him to call the public defender's office.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for April 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:59 a.m. Defendant appears without counsel, in custody. DA Jennifer Harper appears for the State. DA asks for $2500 signature bond having noted that the Def is on a P/P hold. Court orders $2500 signature bond and sets April 20th at 1:30 p.m. for the initial appearance.
